schemacrawler.tools.text.utility

Class PlainTextFormattingHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • schemacrawler.tools.text.utility.PlainTextFormattingHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextFormattingHelper

    public class PlainTextFormattingHelper
extends Object
    Methods to format entire rows of output as text.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi
